Title:
Welcome to the Networks of Centres of Excellence/Bienvenue au Réseaux
de centres d'excellence
Body: Date: Tue, 26 Nov 1996 00:38:35 GMT Server: Apache/0.6.5 Content-type: text/html Last-modified: Fri, 22 Nov 1996 19:43:23 GMT Content-length: 884 Welcome to the Networks of Centres of Excellence/Bienvenue au Réseaux de centres d'excellence Welcome to the Networks of Centres of Excellence Bienvenue au Réseaux de centres d'excellence Welcome to the Networks of Centres of Excellence (NCE) program - an innovative approach to R&D designed to develop Canada's economy and improve the quality of life of Canadians.
